subject: Football
Stadiums and Arenas
lead_paragraph: The N.F.L.’s race to return to the Los Angeles area took a new twist when the two teams said they were willing to build a stadium together if they are unable to get new homes built in their current cities.
snippet: The N.F.L.’s race to return to the Los Angeles area took a new twist when the two teams said they were willing to build a stadium together if they are unable to get new homes built in their current cities.
